name: Prior Catharsis
description:
Prior Catharsis is a transcendental experience inside one's mind. Dodge obstacle as you dodge the bad thoughts during this psychedelic trip.

Instructions:

Press [SPACE] when requested.

More Info:

This game was made for GameJam+ 2019 in less than 48h. All the game art is procedural.  The source code is available at: https://github.com/CrociDB/prior-catharsis
